Revoke Elder Council Membership
Remove this individual's membership in the Elder Council. Only those granted a position by favour may have their membership revoked, landholders, Dukes and Kings cannot.

Swordmasters are individuals who are highly skilled in personal combat. Generally one special individual in a court is granted an honorific title denoting their abilities, serving as a tutor to others at court.
Master
The Master is entitled to a position in the Telvanni Council. It's a title of extreme influence and prestige.
Wise Woman
The Wise Women of the Ashlander clans interpret dreams as prophecies, they are greatly respected by all Ashlanders.

The State and Crown are tolerant, even accepting, of other cultures and religions.
Tolerant
Conservative Society
The State and Crown are conservative when it comes to other cultures and religions. Their presence is tolerated, but not accepted.
Conservative
Intolerant Society
The State and Crown are intolerant of other cultures and religions, viewing them with hostility.
Intolerant
The Tolerance of your realm determines the official state view and acceptance of other cultures and religions.

To the South! Let's take Daggerfall!

A Trader will appear at Court.
A local Trader will be invited to Court.
As a Trader, you have the skill to barter over a price, potentially gaining the item for less.
Free Trade

Trade is completely unregulated, making taxation more difficult. Guilds, Mercantile groups, families and individuals are free to trade in whatever goods and services they wish, caravans are allowed free roam and luxuries and foreign goods are so prevalent as to be available to even common folk. City lords prefer free trade as it brings greater wealth to their Cities and makes them attractive destinations for foreign caravans. (Republics receive a special modifier from this law granting additional bonuses).
Free
Regulated Trade

Trade is regulated by Guilds and specially chartered organisations, allowing for more effective taxation, however certain goods deemed luxuries, or services are monopolised by individuals or organisations leading to higher prices. This is generally the most acceptable compromise for all parties when it comes to Trade regulation, but is particularly enjoyed by feudal lords, who enjoy the greater control the regulations allow them in taxation and trade disputes.
Regulated
Restricted Trade

Trade is heavily regulated and restricted to a few select individuals given special dispensation or charter by their liege lords. Virtually all goods are monopolised and often fall under direct control of the state, allowing for direct taxation. This is generally unpopular with the general populace and City lords.
Restricted
Trade
Trade is the lifeblood of any realm.
Disorganised Training
Your Levies and Retinues receive little if any direct training, they are simply farmers and city dwellers given arms, without much instruction on how to use them.
Disorganised
Organised Training
When men enlist or are pressed into your Armies, they receive basic drill instruction and weapons training at the hands of veterans.
Organised
Professional Training

Your Armies are formed of competent, well-trained professionals, drilled and honed by Veterans and Commanders. Even your City Guards and Peasant Levies spend at minimum one day a week training under the tutelage of professional drillmasters.
Professional

Another day, another lesson.
My parents have been informed of my 'gift'. They have called me to the throne room.
I haven't got any other choice.
[From.GetName] is a vampire! What should I do about this?
Let's go to my tutor.
As long as [From.GetSheHe] doesn't bite me, I don't have a problem with it.
Denounce [From.GetHerHim]!
Bring [From.GetHerHim] to the block!
I couldn't resist! I could feel the blood flowing through her neck. Before long, I was pulled away. The guard took me to the throne room...
...where I await my lieges judgement.
My [From.GetName] is a vampire! [From.GetSheHe] was biting a woman before the guard captured [From.GetHerHim]. The lady was already dead, however
Imprison the vampire!
Let [From.GetHerHim] go.
An eye for an eye...
A travelling sorcerer came at the court. He wanted to speak with me in private. He said he could cure my Porphyric Haemophilia, although he would need some ingredients.
Ask him what he needs for the ritual.
I don't want to be cured.
He says he needs the ashes of a family member and a black soul gem. Acquiring the ashes of a relative will certainly upset anyone in my family and will give me a bad reputation among foreigners.
They are dead anyway. Gather some family-ashes!
That is simply too much to ask!
Now, with the family-ashes in my possession, I will still need a black soul gem. I could buy one from the Mages' Guild, or I could dispatch some adventurers to get one.
Buy it from the Mages' Guild
The adventurers can get it.
After a long chant, the sorcerer said he was done. I feel better now. I thanked him and gave him some food for his journey.
Finally cured!
The need for blood became too much to resist! I bit a peasant woman and fed on her. She's unhurt, apart from small wounds.
This actually isn't too bad!
This is a terrible curse.
We had to wait in a cave while it rained outside. I was on my way back home from a Baron's party. I slept quietly, but when I woke up, all of my guards were gone...
And I had too holes in my neck!
Yet another day of explaining to the little brat!
I have drunk too much at the feast and need to go to the latrine. While I was in the dark corridors, I was suddenly grabbed from behind and someone bit me in my neck. I quickly passed out.
Last thing I saw was the maid who had happily kept the wine flowing.

The clown had invited me for a private show without any of the peasant rabble. I took the chance as the peasants made the show much less enjoyable. However, when I came to his tent, he was nowhere to be seen. When I turned around, I saw him, looking hungrily at my neck.
Your neck... err history books look very dirty. Clean them first!
He bit me! I was lucky the guard was around.
Some of my ancestors were vampires. They have given me some perks.
Let's get this session started.
However, they were known to be vampires.
Their 'illness' was carefully hidden.
OK.
I have become a vampire and the perks I inherited from my vampiric ancestors are nullified now that I have my new powers, although some who know about my ancestry might not forget...
Could I be able to magickally compel them to forget?
AI
AI option
My  [From.GetName] claims [From.GetSheHe] knows about my dubious descent and states [From.GetSheHe] will make it public unless I can somehow bribe him not to reveal the secret.
Everyone loves money and so does [From.GetSheHe].
[From.GetSheHe] will be happy with some lands.
[From.GetSheHe] is too much of a threat to be left alive.
Nobody will believe [From.GetHerHis] lies anyway.
I was relieved when the axe separated [FromFrom.GetName]'s head from his body. As [FromFrom.GetSheHe] died, [FromFrom.GetHerHis] lies died with [FromFrom.GetHerHim].
I'm going to remember the look on [FromFrom.GetHerHis] face when [FromFrom.GetSheHe] was about to die!
My guards failed! The wretched [FromFrom.GetName] escaped and fled to another realm, meanwhile revealing my ancestry to the peasants and nobility alike!
I will kill [FromFrom.GetHerHim] another time!
I just learned about the Alessia.
Why do I even have to learn this?
I hadn't had blood for days. When I saw my ward today, I just couldn't resist.
AI
AI
My  [From.GetName] says [From.GetSheHe] knows I'm a vampire and states [From.GetSheHe] wishes to become one as well.
Oops...
Sure, I will make you one.
Immortality comes at a price.
There are no vampires in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
AI
AI
AI
[From.GetName] has decided to reveal the truth about me being a vampire. This might not go too well with the common folk and my vassals.
Guess who will be found drained of blood tomorrow morning...
Maybe I can get something out of this fanatic vampire-worshipper. I wonder how far [FromFrom.GetSheHe] is willing to go for [FromFrom.GetHerHis] ambitions
I'm still looking for someone special, maybe you want to become my spouse?
How about coming to my bedroom to... do stuff?
Teach me to talk better in public.
Tell me about your strategies and tactics.
Teach me about ruling my lands.
Show me how to scheme like the best!
Tell me about magick.
AI
AI
AI
[From.GetName] has decided to marry me! [From.GetSheHe]'s really pretty. Now I just need to make sure [From.GetSheHe] doesn't escape the instant I turn [From.GetHerHim].
Let us raise a vampiric dynasty!
[From.GetName] has decided not to marry me. [From.GetSheHe] made a foolish decision, for I won't be so merciful next time I see [From.GetHerHim].
There will be another beautiful [From.GetManWoman] to marry just like her.
AI
AI
AI
[From.GetSheHe] walked with me into my bedroom. It was great and we both had fun! Vampires are less fertile, right?
I hope so...
I hope so...
I was so hungry. I couldn't resist the courtier who was wandering the hallway this night. Turns out I am a vampire
[From.GetName] didn't want to follow me to my bed. I guess it isn't worth turning [From.GetSheHe] into a vampire.
[From.GetHerHis] loss.
I need to keep it a secret.
I should request an audience with the sun today. I don't want to live with this.
I have become 16 today. I wonder what my parents have in store for me on this glorious day.
Let's ask them!
My  [From.GetName] asked me for a gift for [From.GetHerHis] 16th birthday. Might this be the right time to give [From.GetHerHim] the gift of immortality?
Of course it is!
A pouch of gold will be enough.
[From.GetSheHe] will love the stallion I have bought for him.
I will build a temple in [From.GetHerHis] name.
My  wants to make me immortal in the cellar. It did sound a bit odd. Should I follow [From.GetHerHim]?
I will do anything to stay young forever!
But that would mean vampirism. Never!
[From.GetName] didn't want to be a vampire. What should I do about this?
His choice, his loss.
No vampire, no throne!

One night while sleeping soundly, you dream of a shadowy figure entering through your window. The figure approaches, kneels beside you and bites deeply into your neck, draining your life's blood. You wake the following morning from a deep sleep, your neck sore and your mind and body weak...

It started as dissatisfaction with your food and drink, seemingly nothing you ate satiated you.  Then came the strange visuals, like you could see the blood flowing through the arteries of your companions, and your eyes became slower to adapt to bright lights, and the sun became uncomfortable wander beneath...

Then came the hunger pains, like a deep burning need within your stomach, clenching like it was consuming itself. You tried to fill it with anything you could find, exotic foods and wines, but nothing worked...
The pain became unbearable, and the arteries of your friends and family seemed to pulsate in your presence, begging you to feed upon them...
You pace back and forth in your chambers, biting your lip. Your hunger drives you, you need to find someone or something to feed upon this night, or you fear the hunger will consume *you*!
Disaster! I have been discovered while feeding upon my victim! The person escaped before I could stop them and my secret is revealed! I am known as a Vampire, an abomination of the night!
Vampire Infestation

A coven of vampires have seemingly appeared from nowhere and setup their home somewhere in this province. They terrorise the roads and outlying settlements at night, and the populace is agitated and fearful at their presence.
Magical anomalies

Beings of pure energy, released during a failed ritual, the magical anomalies can threaten all those who pass near them. The peasants see them as bad omens, and they should be dealt with as soon as possible.
Propagandist

Wasteland
The Way of the Voice
Weaken Vassal Plot
of a weak heart

A hound-like creature is chasing me. I quickly stepped into the run-down farmhouse and locked the door behind me. The beast smashed the door with ease and was onto me. It opened its mouth to bite… I was lying in bed. It was all a dream. Might it happen again?
While taking a stroll in the mountains, a group of witches approached me. They offered me a cure for my lycanthropy, but they would have to have a proper offering.
Sacrifice my heir.
Sacrifice one of my other children.
Sacrifice one of our finest animals.
One witch is one too many!

My father sent me to the countryside, to explore a cave. No sooner than stepping inside, I could hear the heavy breathing of witches. They caught me before I could turn around and run away. One witch had a ceremonial knive, while the other held onto me tightly. When they began chanting, I managed to break loose and run. I escaped, but narrowly.
Let's ask my guardian.
My parent tried to sacrifice me!
The witches have cured me!
Yes!
The witches failed to cure me!
Those treacherous witches!
I woke up somewhere in the woods with a bloody taste to my mouth. My clothes were ravaged and blooded everywhere. After taking some time to think, I realized I'm a werewolf.
Let's keep it a secret.
I don't have anything to hide.
I have been gaining fame recently. Might they have forgotten about my other side?
Probably, yes
A ruler who is known to be a werewolf has been gaining fame and fortune. Should we do something about it?
No more fortune for him!
That monster can have something good, for once.
I have finally risen to become Grandmaster of the Silver Hand.
Those monsters shall tremble!
I have been approached by an emissary from an organization known as the Silver Hand. They hunt werewolves, apparently. He asked me if I could join their faction.
They are pursuing a noble cause. I shall join.
Pfft, silly bandits.
My  [From.GetName] told me about a nightmare [From.GetSheHe] had. [From.GetSheHe] was being hunted by a werewolf.
I can make that happen.
An opportune moment to give him Hircine's gift.
It was just a dream.
I was exploring the woods when I heard a horrid scream coming from my rear. I turned around to look where the sound came from and I saw a werewolf. Before I could respond, it attacked me.
Ouch...
I was just hunting when I heard growls coming from the bushes. Before I could draw my arrows, it was onto me.
It was a werewolf...
I woke up somewhere in the woods with a bloody taste to my mouth. My clothes were ravaged and bloodied everywhere. After taking some time to think, I realised I'm a werewolf.
I should tell my father.
I should hide my new life.
I can't live with this!.
[From.GetName] told me [From.GetSheHe] is a werewolf.
Keep it a secret.
Denounce him.
Kill the abomination!
I found myself in the woods with the ravaged body of one of my liege's courtiers.
Oops…
My liege suspected it was me and imprisoned me.
One of my courtiers has been killed by a werewolf. The werewolf was one of my courtiers and has been imprisoned.
So be it.
I have come of age!
Let's tell dad!
[From.GetName] has come of age. [From.GetSheHe] is expecting a big present.
Give [From.GetHerHim] the blood of Hircine!
This curse is mine to bear.
I have been spotted giving one of my children our gift. Apparently, one of my courtiers followed us.
Give chase!
Let the courtier be.
Eh, I don't really care *that* much.

column2: Winterhold stands independent again, ready to face the world under its own banner, with me as its [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
For Winterhold!
For many years now the Kingdom of Winterhold has kept its independence and none now dispute our right to claim our ancient lands as our own.
These lands shall always be Winterhold's!
